rounds.attribution: Real photograph — downhill skier in powder snow
rounds.pro_tip: SNOW SPRAY: Real snow kicked up by skiers is chaotic — thousands of unique ice crystals catching light at random angles. AI snow spray tends to look like white fog or a uniform blur.
GEAR DETAILS: Real ski equipment has brand logos, buckle mechanisms, and wear marks. AI often creates generic equipment with suspiciously smooth surfaces and unreadable text on labels.
BODY PHYSICS: In real action shots, the athlete's body shows natural tension — strained muscles, asymmetric posture from force. AI athletes often look posed, like mannequins frozen mid-flight.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph — alpine mountain panorama with snow
rounds.pro_tip: SNOW TEXTURE: Real snow has complex layering — wind crust, powder pockets, ice patches, animal tracks. AI snow is often a uniform white blanket that looks like frosting.
BREATH IN COLD AIR: Real photos in freezing conditions show visible breath, red noses, and fogged goggles. AI winter portraits often forget these environmental effects entirely.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph — ice skating rink close-up
rounds.pro_tip: ICE SURFACE: Real ice has visible scratches, chips, and uneven patches from skate blades. AI ice tends to look like glass — too smooth, too reflective, too perfect.
CROWD FACES: If there are spectators in the background, zoom in. AI generates faces that blur into smudges or have misaligned features. Real crowd shots show distinct, varied individuals.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph — cross-country skiing trail through forest
rounds.pro_tip: TREE BRANCHES: Real winter trees have intricate, irregular branch patterns with varying snow accumulation. AI trees tend toward symmetrical branching with unnaturally even snow distribution.
HORIZON LINE: In real mountain photos, the horizon has natural atmospheric haze and color gradients. AI often creates an abrupt transition between sky and mountains that looks like a backdrop.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph — ski resort gondola against mountain backdrop
rounds.pro_tip: CABLE AND WIRE: Real cables have consistent thickness, natural sag from gravity, and visible strands. AI frequently renders cables that change thickness, float impossibly, or merge into the background.
